data.title: Hugo Awards by Year

data.text:
The links below give the Hugo Award finalists and winners for past years.

Our site currently contains only lists of winners and finalists. We have provided links to external sites that provide additional voting data and will be working to bring this information onto this site as it develops. In recent years, Worldcons have included lists of those works/people that did not make the finalist shortlist, and when such information is available, we include a link to it with the results.
